name: Tentree Constellation Juniper Hoodie - Men's
description:
Out-of-this-world comfort, the treline and a glowing roadmap of the galaxy, all in one soft hooded sweatshirt.Constellation graphics emit a soft glow in the dark, making it easier to find both Dippers.Soft organic cotton and recycled polyester blend is comfy and warm.Raglan sleeves keep seams out from under bag straps.Large kangaroo pocket is great place to keep necessities close, but out of the way.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that 10 trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.
